decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2976 - 011/MT, 2976 - 012/MT and 2976 - 013/MT Received: 06/08/2015, 2976 - 014/MT Rev A, 2976 - 015/MT Rev A 'Location Plan/ Block Plan', 2976 - 015/MT Rev AB 'Proposed Elevations' and 2976 - 016/MT  Rev A Received: 20/10/2015 and Design and Access Statement Received:  06/08/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The side infill extensions herby permitted at both No.96 and No.98 shall be commenced and erected simultaneously and neither shall be occupied until the extensions to both properties have been completed in accordance with the approved plans.
Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the side elevations shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 6 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  side elevation walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of single storey side infill extensions to both no.96 and no. 98 and a single storey rear extension to no. 96
